          <title>
            <string language="en">Wordsearch: Earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wordsearch: Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Wordsearch : La terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Wordsearch: Terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Wordsearch: Terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Wordsearch: Γη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Wordsearch: Tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations that show a wordsearch containing seven words relating to the Earth. This illustration shows the uncompleted wordsearch. The other illustration shows the answers.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">core</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">igneous</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mantle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sedimentary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wordsearch</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von zwei Abbildungen, die ein wordsearch 
zeigen, das sieben Wörter in bezug auf die Masse enthält. 
Diese Abbildung zeigt das unvollständige wordsearch. Die 
andere Abbildung zeigt die Antworten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de deux illustrations qui montrent un 
wordsearch contenant sept mots concernant la terre. Cette 
illustration montre le wordsearch inachevé. L'autre 
illustration montre les réponses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações que mostram 
um wordsearch que contem sete palavras que se relacionam à terra. 
Esta ilustração mostra o wordsearch uncompleted. A outra
ilustração mostra as respostas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni che mostrano 
un wordsearch che contiene sette parole per quanto riguarda la terra. 
Questa illustrazione mostra il wordsearch incompiuto. 
L'altra illustrazione mostra le risposte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν ένα 
wordsearch που περιέχει επτά λέξεις σχετικά με τη γη. 
Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ασυμπλήρωτο wordsearch. 
Η άλλη απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τις απαντήσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones que muestran un 
wordsearch que contiene siete palabras referente a la tierra. 
Esta ilustración muestra el wordsearch inacabado. La otra
ilustración muestra las respuestas.</string>
          </description>
